casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dane LOCKLEAR, Jr. No. 578A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2008. William P. Hart, Jr., Valerie Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of January 2008 by Defendant to Bypass N.C. Court of Appeals in Indictment Numbers 00CRS4643, 4644 and 4645:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of January 2008."
